name: Jump & Shoot
description:
Jump & Shoot is an indie game that was born with the idea of entertaining its players and at the same time offering them a challenging game. It has a style and a very marked visual range, which fits perfectly with the simplicity of the gameplay itself.

In this game you will simply take charge of the movements of a ball, that you will have to make it ascend as much as possible, it is perfect because besides you only need a mouse to play it.
The ball will have to be supported on mobile platforms that appear, each with a different placement and movements

As simple as this: the first touch makes the ball go up, the second will make the ball load and fall very fast. With this, the game may seem simple, but it is extremely difficult.
The difficulty of the game lies in how the ball goes down and how the stage behaves. When you make the ball go down, the rest of the stage will continue to move, so you'll have to calculate the timing perfectly for the platform to reach and do not lose.
